recipe.title: Trail Mix Porridge
ingredients: 1/2 cup walnut pieces, toasted and coarsely ground
instructions: Stir all the ingredients in a slow cooker until the maple syrup has dissolved and all the grains are moistened. Cover and cook on low for 6 hours, or until the porridge is creamy and the grains are tender.
